creator: Netlift
descriptionHtml:
It's simple and fast. Put your origin and destination address, date/time and you're done! You can book a ticket with one of our Netlift Shuttle drivers or, for daily commute, with one of our carpoolers.

Security is key at Netlift. Our selected Netlift Shuttle drivers are taxi drivers. That means that they are legal and they got a background check.

Can't leave your car at home?
Drive! Pick-up someone commuting a similar route and get reimbursed for gas and parking expenses (certain conditions apply). With fixed pricing you are never responsible for negotiating ride fares. Your money is transferred directly to your e-wallet, and can be deposited to your bank account in 3 simple steps.

I'd love to commute without cars!
Ride! Two options for you: a private chauffeur or a carpooler. Our unique matching algorithm calculates the most efficient carpool rides to get you to work or school during peak traffic hours. Ride fares are fixed based on distance, so you always know how much the ride will cost before booking it. Review your matches and select with the driver of your choice. When your trip is complete, your account is automatically billed, and a receipt sent to you by email.
__

How does pricing work?
Prices are fixed based on distance and transactions are 100% cash-free. You always know how much you'll pay or get reimbursed before booking a ride, no negotiating required.

Can I ride and drive?
You can easily ride today and drive tomorrow. Create 2 unique commutes, one as a rider and one as a driver and manage both from the same home screen.

Is it safe?
You bet. In fact, Netlift is considered the most secure carpooling system in Canada, and you are a big reason why. Our two-way rating system enables riders and drivers to give feedback after each ride, helping to build a stronger community.

Is carpooling legal in Quebec?
Absolutely. In fact, it's fully endorsed by the Government of Quebec. Read more here: http://bit.ly/2bUSfLS

__

Plan your transit:
1) Download the app
2) Create an account
3) Input your commute details
4) Book your ride

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/netlift_me
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/netlift
Visit our Help Centre: https://netlift.zendesk.com
Contact us: support@netlift.me

It's simple and fast. Put your origin and destination address, date/time and you're done! You can book a ticket with one of our Netlift Shuttle drivers or, for daily commute, with one of our carpoolers.

Security is key at Netlift. Our selected Netlift Shuttle drivers are taxi drivers. That means that they are legal and they got a background check.

Can't leave your car at home?
Drive! Pick-up someone commuting a similar route and get reimbursed for gas and parking expenses (certain conditions apply). With fixed pricing you are never responsible for negotiating ride fares. Your money is transferred directly to your e-wallet, and can be deposited to your bank account in 3 simple steps.

I'd love to commute without cars!
Ride! Two options for you: a private chauffeur or a carpooler. Our unique matching algorithm calculates the most efficient carpool rides to get you to work or school during peak traffic hours. Ride fares are fixed based on distance, so you always know how much the ride will cost before booking it. Review your matches and select with the driver of your choice. When your trip is complete, your account is automatically billed, and a receipt sent to you by email.
__

How does pricing work?
Prices are fixed based on distance and transactions are 100% cash-free. You always know how much you'll pay or get reimbursed before booking a ride, no negotiating required.

Can I ride and drive?
You can easily ride today and drive tomorrow. Create 2 unique commutes, one as a rider and one as a driver and manage both from the same home screen.

Is it safe?
You bet. In fact, Netlift is considered the most secure carpooling system in Canada, and you are a big reason why. Our two-way rating system enables riders and drivers to give feedback after each ride, helping to build a stronger community.

Is carpooling legal in Quebec?
Absolutely. In fact, it's fully endorsed by the Government of Quebec. Read more here: http://bit.ly/2bUSfLS

__

Plan your transit:
1) Download the app
2) Create an account
3) Input your commute details
4) Book your ride

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/netlift_me
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/netlift
Visit our Help Centre: https://netlift.zendesk.com
Contact us: support@netlift.me

title: Netlift

creator: Netlift
descriptionHtml:
It's simple and fast. Put your origin and destination address, date/time and you're done! You can book a ticket with one of our Netlift Shuttle drivers or, for daily commute, with one of our carpoolers.

Security is key at Netlift. Our selected Netlift Shuttle drivers are taxi drivers. That means that they are legal and they got a background check.

Can't leave your car at home?
Drive! Pick-up someone commuting a similar route and get reimbursed for gas and parking expenses (certain conditions apply). With fixed pricing you are never responsible for negotiating ride fares. Your money is transferred directly to your e-wallet, and can be deposited to your bank account in 3 simple steps.

I'd love to commute without cars!
Ride! Two options for you: a private chauffeur or a carpooler. Our unique matching algorithm calculates the most efficient carpool rides to get you to work or school during peak traffic hours. Ride fares are fixed based on distance, so you always know how much the ride will cost before booking it. Review your matches and select with the driver of your choice. When your trip is complete, your account is automatically billed, and a receipt sent to you by email.
__

How does pricing work?
Prices are fixed based on distance and transactions are 100% cash-free. You always know how much you'll pay or get reimbursed before booking a ride, no negotiating required.

Can I ride and drive?
You can easily ride today and drive tomorrow. Create 2 unique commutes, one as a rider and one as a driver and manage both from the same home screen.

Is it safe?
You bet. In fact, Netlift is considered the most secure carpooling system in Canada, and you are a big reason why. Our two-way rating system enables riders and drivers to give feedback after each ride, helping to build a stronger community.

Is carpooling legal in Quebec?
Absolutely. In fact, it's fully endorsed by the Government of Quebec. Read more here: http://bit.ly/2bUSfLS

__

Plan your transit:
1) Download the app
2) Create an account
3) Input your commute details
4) Book your ride

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/netlift_me
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/netlift
Visit our Help Centre: https://netlift.zendesk.com
Contact us: support@netlift.me
